modName: Summon Spriggan High Matron and Spriggan Drone
summary: Adds two spell books to conjure a Spriggan High Matron and a Spriggan Drone. Both custom named, and stronger then their regular counterparts, but not over-powered.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]This was a mod request I received today. I thought it would be fun so I made them. Both spell books can be found for sale at Belethors General good store in Whiterun. Or if you feel sneaky... you can steal them from him. As they are sitting on a wardrobe just to the right of the table in the middle of the store. The High Matron is taller then a regular Matron.

[youtube]Pajx4aD0tSw[/youtube][/center]
author: UrValdBagina
